careerPaths.title: Junior Forensic Analyst
careerPaths.description: Assists in collecting and analyzing digital evidence from devices and networks for legal investigations. Supports senior analysts in data recovery and report preparation for law enforcement or corporate clients.

careerPaths.title: Senior Forensic Analyst
careerPaths.description: Leads digital investigations, recovers complex evidence, and provides expert testimony in court. Ensures proper evidence handling and collaborates with legal teams.

careerPaths.title: Forensics Team Lead
careerPaths.description: Manages a team of forensic analysts, develops investigation protocols, and ensures compliance with legal standards in large-scale cybercrime cases.

careerJumps.notes: Transition requires deeper knowledge of network security and threat mitigation, often gained through certifications like CISSP or CEH.
Requires learning big data frameworks like Hadoop or Spark, as well as statistical modeling for large datasets.

careerPaths.title: Robotics Technician
careerPaths.description: Assembles and tests robotic components, focusing on hardware and basic software integration. Supports prototyping and troubleshooting in industries like manufacturing and healthcare.

careerPaths.title: Robotics Engineer
careerPaths.description: Designs and programs robotic systems for applications like autonomous vehicles or surgical robots. Integrates sensors and AI to enhance functionality.

careerPaths.title: Senior Robotics Engineer
careerPaths.description: Leads robotics projects, develops advanced control algorithms, and oversees system integration for complex applications like industrial automation or space exploration.

careerJumps.notes: Focus on expanding AI expertise, particularly in neural networks and deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
Requires learning IoT protocols like MQTT and cloud integration for connected devices.

careerPaths.title: Cloud Support Engineer
careerPaths.description: Monitors and troubleshoots cloud infrastructure, assists clients with deployments, and ensures system availability across platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP.

careerPaths.title: Cloud Engineer
careerPaths.description: Designs and manages cloud infrastructure, optimizes performance, and implements security measures for scalable, cloud-based solutions.

careerPaths.title: Cloud Solutions Architect
careerPaths.description: Leads cloud strategy development, designs complex systems, and oversees enterprise-wide cloud migrations for organizations.

careerJumps.notes: Transition involves gaining expertise in cybersecurity frameworks and threat detection tools like Splunk or FireEye.
Familiarity with cloud platforms makes learning big data tools like Apache Spark or Snowflake straightforward.

careerPaths.title: Bioinformatics Technician
careerPaths.description: Manages biological databases, performs basic genomic data analysis, and supports research teams with computational tools in academic or industry settings.

careerPaths.title: Bioinformatics Analyst
careerPaths.description: Analyzes complex biological datasets, develops computational models, and contributes to genomic research for drug discovery or personalized medicine.

careerPaths.title: Senior Bioinformatics Engineer
careerPaths.description: Leads bioinformatics research, designs software for biological data analysis, and collaborates with academic or industry partners on genomic projects.

careerJumps.notes: Skills in large-scale data analysis transfer well to big data tools like Hadoop or Apache Spark.
Requires learning machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch for predictive modeling in biological contexts.

careerPaths.title: Junior Game Developer
careerPaths.description: Codes basic game mechanics, assists in debugging, and supports design teams in creating interactive gaming experiences using engines like Unity.

careerPaths.title: Game Developer
careerPaths.description: Develops core game features, optimizes performance, and collaborates with artists to deliver engaging gameplay using engines like Unreal.

careerPaths.title: Lead Game Designer
careerPaths.description: Oversees game development projects, defines creative vision, and ensures technical and artistic alignment for AAA or indie titles.

careerJumps.notes: Focus on learning UX research methods and tools like Figma to design user interfaces for broader applications.
Requires significant training in AI and machine learning, particularly for NPC behavior or procedural content generation.

careerPaths.title: Junior Data Engineer
careerPaths.description: Builds and maintains data pipelines, processes large datasets, and supports data analysts with accessible data for business insights.

careerPaths.title: Data Engineer
careerPaths.description: Designs scalable data pipelines, optimizes big data systems, and ensures data integrity for analytics across industries.

careerPaths.title: Big Data Architect
careerPaths.description: Develops enterprise data strategies, designs big data architectures, and aligns solutions with business objectives for data-driven decisions.

careerJumps.notes: Leverage familiarity with cloud platforms to master AWS, Azure, or GCP architectures.
Requires learning machine learning algorithms and tools like TensorFlow for predictive analytics.

careerPaths.title: IoT Developer
careerPaths.description: Develops software for connected devices, focusing on sensor integration and communication protocols for IoT systems in smart homes or industrial applications.

careerPaths.title: IoT Systems Engineer
careerPaths.description: Designs and implements IoT ecosystems, ensuring secure and scalable connectivity for smart devices across industries.

careerPaths.title: IoT Solutions Architect
careerPaths.description: Leads IoT strategy, designs scalable architectures, and oversees deployment of smart systems in sectors like healthcare and manufacturing.

careerJumps.notes: Familiarity with cloud platforms makes transitioning to cloud architecture roles seamless.
Requires learning robotics-specific programming like ROS and hardware integration.
